mapper.insert: insert ignore into trade (trade_code, order_code, deal_price, deal_quantity, deal_amount, service_fee, deal_time) values (#{tradeCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dealPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dealQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dealAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{serviceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dealTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select trade_code, order_code, deal_price, deal_quantity, deal_amount, service_fee, deal_time from trade
